snippet.title: SI.com: Richmond lovin' Sweet 16, Griffin goes bonkers, Ochocinco's soccer tryout
snippet.description:

snippet.title: USC snaps up Enfield from Florida Gulf Coast
snippet.description:

snippet.title: USC's Leinart wins Heisman Trophy
snippet.description:

snippet.title: 10 hospitalized after USC football victory over Stanford
snippet.description:
* Ten people were hospitalized after the University of Southern California's football team upset the Stanford Cardinal on Saturday night.
http://www.cnn.com/2013/11/17/us/usc-stanford-hospitalized-fans/index.html

snippet.title: USC stripped of 2004 BCS title
snippet.description:
* The group that crowns college football's national champion stripped the 2004-05 title from the University of Southern California on Monday, a decision stemming from an NCAA investigation of former USC running back Reggie Bush. No 2004 champion will be...
http://news.blogs.cnn.com/2011/06/06/usc-stripped-of-2004-national-football-championship/

snippet.title: Penn State football loses star tailback to USC
snippet.description:
* Silas Redd, who last year racked up five consecutive 100-yard games as tailback for Penn State's Nittany Lions, is leaving the troubled team to head west.
http://www.cnn.com/2012/07/31/sport/football/pennsylvania-penn-state/index.html
